A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney butchered Luke's character and with it\, the Star Wars universe - he alone personifies the jedi and the light side in the clearest way\, yet in this movie was portrayed as a weak old fool\, who slipped casually into the dark side to kill ben solo\, his sister's and one of his best friend's son!! That's like writing a sequel to the bible\, where we find out\, that jesus is really a bad guy and the previous books were BS. You wouldnt see many christians flocking to buy the blasphemous piece of scribble! Disney - you are mishandling Star Wars\, fix it\, or lose it to ambiguity.
